thread.title: Kay @ Sutton Ministry
thread.title_full: DoItYourselfLettering.com reviewed by Kay @ Sutton Ministry

author: Kay @ Sutton Ministry
title: Kay @ Sutton Ministry
text:
We are very pleased with the service and the product from DIY Letting.
We installed it ourselves. We did have one mishap, but when I contacted them, they were eager to please and replaced it. We will definitely recommend and use again. Very affordable, easy to apply (I was nervous/but it went well).
